transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello mam, mai Prasanth Goyal baat kar raha hu Kolhapur Maharashtra se.

Customer: Ha ji, ha ji, ha ji, ha ji sir.

Executive: Ha mam actually kya hua hai humne ek 15-20 din pehle woh hamara subscription renew kiya hai payment ka.

Customer: Ha ha.

Executive: Ha uska abhi tak hume bill nahi mila hai, kisi tarah urgent invoice na mai karwati hu, mai karwati hu, mai karwati hu.

Executive: Okay, yahi number pe karwa dijiye madam aaj.

Customer: Sure, sure, sure.

Executive: Ha okay, okay madam. Thank you, thank you.

Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received the bill.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to send the bill.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, bill, payment
